explains: adv. 慢性地，经常复发地；长期地，习惯性地；严重地

sentences.en: Most of them were chronically ill.
sentences.cn: 他们中大部分人都有慢性病。

sentences.en: It is required by law to shut down banks which it regards as chronically short of capital.
sentences.cn: 法律规定要关闭资金长期短缺的银行。

sentences.en: Chronically high levels of these hormones have been linked to heart disease.
sentences.cn: 这些激素长期保持高水平与心脏病有关。
